jcr:root.jcr:title: ryan.palmer@spambob.com POST on I finally gave in and got poles.

object.jcr:description: Weston, I did s lot of research on this. For those who would like to know, a very exhaustive study found that hiking (or trekking) poles reduce stress on lower joints by as much as 25%, help extend muscle endurance, and decrease soreness the next day. Needless to say, I never hike without mine.

target.displayName: I finally gave in and got poles.
